TadasECOMMS2020.Title: Near-complete loss of fire-resistant primary tropical forest cover in Sumatra and Kalimantan
TadasECOMMS2020.Author: Nikonovas, T., Spessa, A., Doerr, S.H., Clay, G.D. & Mezbahuddin, S.
TadasECOMMS2020.Description: Loss of contiguous tracts of primary forest enhances the susceptibility of tropical peatland and forest to fires triggered by increasingly severe droughts, according to satellite-based remote sensing of Sumatra and Kalimantan from the past two decades

TadasEGU2019.Title: Forecasting fire activity in Indonesia
TadasEGU2019.Author: Nikonovas et al.,
TadasEGU2019.Description: A machine learning approach for modelling fire occurrence in Indonesia. The algorithms and input datasets used and model performance validation for the past years

SymonEGU2019.Title: Modelling Seasonal Variations in Water Table Depth over the Tropical Peatlands of Riau, Sumatra, Indonesia
SymonEGU2019.Author: Mezbahuddin et al.,
SymonEGU2019.Description: A process-based simulations of water table depth for Riau employing the Ecosys model. The model setup and validation using independent observational data.

AllanEGU2018.Title: Towards a Fire Early Warning System for Indonesia (ToFEWSI)
AllanEGU2018.Author: Spessa et al.,
AllanEGU2018.Description: ToFEWSI project concept explained; the problem, scientific background, project goals and proposed timeline.
